items is granted with purchase of pattern where to find hodgepodge crochet all techniques and finished sizes are listed in us terminology measurements approximately 28 71 cm wide x 34 86 cm long supplies size i 5 5mm crochet hook red heart super saver 7 oz 198g 364 yds 333 m color any gauge 4 pattern stitches single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet = 3 7 62 cm 4 row = 2 5 cm skill level beginner stitches and terms used double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet rs right side single_crochet single crochet skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch instructions loosely chain 103 row 1 rs single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet in 4th chain from hook skipped chains count as half_double_crochet *skip 2 chains single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet in next chain repeat from * across to last chain half_double_crochet in last chain turn 101 sts row 2 chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet and each double_crochet across half_double_crochet in top of turning chain turn repeat row 2 until the blanket measures approximately 34 inches last row chain 1 *3sc in corner single_crochet evenly across blanket repeat from * around join with a slip_stitch to beginning single_crochet finish off and weave in tails 1 baby s best bumpy blanket
